string_utilities module¶

Utility methods for working with strings

utilities.string_utilities.are_strings_anagrams(s1, s2)¶

Decides if two strings contain the same letters, in any order. For example, ‘book’ and ‘ookb’ are anagrams.

Parameters

  • s1 – the first string to compare

  • s2 – the second string to compare

Returns

True if the strings are anagrams, False otherwise

utilities.string_utilities.reverse(s)¶

Reverses the order of characters in a string

Parameters

s – the string to reverse

Returns

a new string with the characters in reverse order
